description:
Bonus costumes for Xu Shu, Mitsunari Ishida, and Da Ji will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in all-new style.

■Content
Bonus Costumes for "Xu Shu", "Mitsunari Ishida", and "Da Ji"

■How to use
You can change costumes from camp by selecting "Party" - "Select Costume".
name: Bonus Costumes for "Xu Shu", "Mitsunari Ishida", and "Da Ji"
